org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema
Class AeSchemaDateTime

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema.AeAbstractPatternBasedSchemaType
      org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema.AeAbstractTZBasedSchemaType
          org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema.AeSchemaDateTime
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeSchemaType, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeSchemaDate, AeSchemaTime
public class AeSchemaDateTime
extends AeAbstractTZBasedSchemaType
implements java.io.Serializable

This class represents a time as defined by the xsd:dateTime datatype. An object of this type can be constructed from an xsd:dateTime formatted string, or from a Date or Calendar java object.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

AeSchemaDateTime

protected AeSchemaDateTime()
Simple constructor - creates a schema dateTime object with a default GregorianCalendar representing the current time.

AeSchemaDateTime

public AeSchemaDateTime(java.lang.String aSchemaDateTime)
Creates a schema dateTime object given a xsd:dateTime formatted String. This string is typically gotten from a value found in an XML document.

Parameters:
aSchemaDateTime - A date formatted in XSD format (subset of ISO 8601).

AeSchemaDateTime
